kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.

kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

<script type="text/javascript">
var CartPerf = (function() {
  var _hasUedata = (typeof uet == 'function');
  var _startedLoading = false;

  var loading = function() {
    if (!_startedLoading && _isReportingEvents()) {
      uet('cb');
    }
    _startedLoading = true;
  };

  var aboveTheFoldLoaded = function() {
    if (_startedLoading && _isReportingEvents()) {
      uet('af');
    }
  };

  var criticalFeatureLoaded = function() {
    if (_startedLoading && _isReportingEvents()) {
      uet('cf');
    }
  };

  var x1Loaded = function () {
    if (_startedLoading && _isReportingEvents()) {
      uet('x1');
    }
  }

  var _isReportingEvents = function() {
    return _hasUedata;
  };

  var _hasUEForAJAXRequest = (typeof ues == 'function') && (typeof uex == 'function');
  var _actionNumber = 0;
  var _scope = "cart-ajax";

  var getScope = function() {
    return _scope;
  }

  var resetUEForAJAXRequest = function() {
    _actionNumber++;
    _scope = "cart-ajax-" + _actionNumber;
    if (window.ue && _hasUedata && _hasUEForAJAXRequest) {
      uet("tc", _scope);         // set time-of-click
      ues("ctb", _scope, "1");   // set ctb flag
    }
  }

  // set start time
  var setStartTimeForAJAXRequest = function() {
    if (window.ue && _hasUedata && _hasUEForAJAXRequest) {
      ues("t0", _scope, new Date());
    }
  }

  // set request ID
  var setIDForAJAXRequest = function(rid) {
    if (window.ue && _hasUedata && _hasUEForAJAXRequest) {
      ues("id", _scope, rid);
    }
  }

  // record the event of critical feature loaded
  var cfLoadedForAJAXRequest = function() {
    if (window.ue && _hasUedata && _hasUEForAJAXRequest) {
      uet("cf", _scope);
    }
  }

  // record the event of page loaded
  var pageLoadedForAJAXRequest = function(scope) {
    if (window.ue && _hasUedata && _hasUEForAJAXRequest) {
      if (scope != null) {
        uex("ld", scope);
      } else {
        uex("ld", _scope);
      }
    }
  }



  
  var x1LoadedForAJAXRequest = function() {
    if (window.ue && _hasUedata && _hasUEForAJAXRequest) {
      uet("x1", _scope);
    }
  }

  var x2LoadedForAJAXRequest = function() {
    if (window.ue && _hasUedata && _hasUEForAJAXRequest) {
      uet("x2", _scope);
    }
  }

  var x3LoadedForAJAXRequest = function() {
    if (window.ue && _hasUedata && _hasUEForAJAXRequest) {
      uet("x3", _scope);
    }
  }

  var x2Loaded = function () {
    if (_startedLoading && _isReportingEvents()) {
      uet('x2');
    }
  }

  var x3Loaded = function () {
    if (_startedLoading && _isReportingEvents()) {
      uet('x3');
    }
  }

  loading();

  return {
    aboveTheFoldLoaded:         aboveTheFoldLoaded,
    cfLoadedForAJAXRequest:     cfLoadedForAJAXRequest,
    criticalFeatureLoaded:      criticalFeatureLoaded,
    x1Loaded:                   x1Loaded,
    getScope:                   getScope,
    pageLoadedForAJAXRequest:   pageLoadedForAJAXRequest,
    resetUEForAJAXRequest:      resetUEForAJAXRequest,
    setIDForAJAXRequest:        setIDForAJAXRequest,
    setStartTimeForAJAXRequest: setStartTimeForAJAXRequest,


    x1LoadedForAJAXRequest:     x1LoadedForAJAXRequest,
    x2Loaded:                   x2Loaded,
    x2LoadedForAJAXRequest:     x2LoadedForAJAXRequest,
    x3Loaded:                   x3Loaded,
    x3LoadedForAJAXRequest:     x3LoadedForAJAXRequest,
  };
})();
</script>

<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/01k-MkHzHhL._RC|41EqmOiPn0L.css_.css?AUIClients/SharedHUCDesktopCSSAsset" />




<style type="text/css">
div.newclearer {
  margin-bottom: 3px;
}

#hlb-imb .msg a .product-title:hover {
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #E47911 !important;
}

 /* if enable punchout */
#hlb-approval-btn .punchout-submit-button {
    background-image: url("https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/shopping-cart/punchout-approval._CB369556963_.png");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    padding: 0 10px 0 35px;
    background-position: 5px center;
}

#upsell-section-divider .a-divider-inner {
    margin-bottom: -30px;
}

.upsell-buttons {
    min-width: 100px;
}

.a-button-preorder.upsell-buttons .a-button-text {
    padding: 0 6px 0 7px;
}

#hl-confirm-text .a-box {
    margin-left: -15px;
}
#hl-confirm-text .a-box .a-box-inner {
    padding-bottom: 0px;
}
#hlbcc #cbcc_banner_container {
    padding-bottom: 0px;
}


#hlb-page-container {
    width: 900px;
}





</style>

<!--[if IE]>
<style type="text/css">
div.newclearer {
  width: 400px;
  clear: both;
  margin-bottom: 0px;
}
</style>
<![endif]-->

<!--[if lt IE 9]>
<style type="text/css">
    .a-popover-header h4{
        min-height: 16px;
    }

    .upsell-buttons .a-button-inner {
        min-width: 100px;
    }
</style>
<![endif]-->

<!--[if IE 7]>
<style type="text/css">
   .a-popover-header, .a-popover-footer {
        zoom: -1 !important;
    }
</style>
<![endif]-->

<!--[if lt IE 8]>
<style type="text/css">
    #hlbcc IMG {
        max-width: none;
    }

    .inline-lt-ie8 {
        display:inline !important;
    }

</style>
<![endif]-->

<!--[if lte IE 8]>
<style type="text/css">
    #hl-items .ie-wrap {
        width: 100% !important;
    }
</style>
<![endif]-->

<!--[if IE 9]>
<style type="text/css">
    .divider-ie9 {
        border-top-color: #e7e7e7;
        border-top-width: 1px;
        border-top-style: solid;
    }
</style>
<![endif]-->

  function buildIssInitObject(opts, issOpts, isNewIss) {
    var issInitObj = {
        src: opts.host
      , sessionId: opts.sessionId
      , requestId: opts.requestId
      , mkt: opts.marketId
      , obfMkt: opts.obfuscatedMarketId
      , pageType: opts.pageType
      , language: opts.language
      , customerId: opts.customerId
      , fresh: opts.fresh
      , b2b: opts.b2b
      , aliases: opts.searchAliases
      , fb: issOpts.fallbackFlag
      , isDigitalFeaturesEnabled: issOpts.isDigitalFeaturesEnabled
      , isWayfindingEnabled: issOpts.isWayfindingEnabled
      , issPrimeEligible: issOpts.issPrimeEligible
      , deptText: issOpts.departmentText
      , sugText: issOpts.suggestionText
      , filterAliases: opts.filterAliases
      , biaWidgetUrl: opts.biaWidgetUrl
      , recentSearchesTreatment: issOpts.recentSearchesTreatment
      , authorSuggestionText: issOpts.authorSuggestionText
      , recentSearchesText: issOpts.recentSearchesText
      , biaTitleText: issOpts.biaTitleText
      , biaPurchasedText: issOpts.biaPurchasedText
      , biaViewAllText: issOpts.biaViewAllText
      , biaViewAllManageText: issOpts.biaViewAllManageText
      , biaAndText: issOpts.biaAndText
      , biaManageText: issOpts.biaManageText
      , biaWeblabTreatment: issOpts.biaWeblabTreatment
      , issNavConfig: issOpts.issNavConfig
      , cf: issOpts.cf
      , ime: opts.isJpOrCn
      , mktid: opts.marketId
      , qs: opts.isJpOrCn
      , issCorpus: issOpts.issCorpus
      , deepNodeISS: {
          searchAliasAccessor: function($) {
            return (window.SearchPageAccess && window.SearchPageAccess.searchAlias()) ||
                   $('select.searchSelect').children().attr('data-root-alias');
          },
          searchAliasDisplayNameAccessor: function() {
            return (window.SearchPageAccess && window.SearchPageAccess.searchAliasDisplayName());
          }
        }
      , useAmazonEmberFontFamily: issOpts.useAmazonEmberFontFamily
      , warmUpConnectionToCompletionSvc: issOpts.warmUpConnectionToCompletionSvc
      , removeDeepNodeISS: issOpts.removeDeepNodeISS
      , trendingTreatment: issOpts.trendingTreatment
      , useAPIV2: issOpts.useAPIV2
      , opfSwitch: issOpts.opfSwitch
    };

    // If we aren't using the new ISS then we need to add these properties
    if (!isNewIss) {
      issInitObj.dd = issOpts.dropdown; // The element with id searchDropdownBox doesn't exist in C.
      issInitObj.imeSpacing = issOpts.imeSpacing;
      issInitObj.isNavInline = 1;
      issInitObj.triggerISSOnClick = 0;
      issInitObj.sc = 1;
      issInitObj.np = issOpts.np;
    }

    return issInitObj;
  } // END buildIssInitObject

    .cbcc_box .cbcc_cboxTL, .cbcc_box .cbcc_cboxTR, .cbcc_box .cbcc_cboxBL, .cbcc_box .cbcc_cboxBR { position:absolute; display:block; width:10px; height:10px; z-index:1; }

    .cbcc_cboxTL { top:-1px; left:-1px; }
    .cbcc_cboxTR { top:-1px; right:-1px; }
    .cbcc_cboxBL { bottom:-1px; left:-1px; }
    .cbcc_cboxBR { bottom:-1px; right:-1px; }
    .cbcc_cboxR { position:absolute; display:block; width:1px; height:100%; top:-1px; right:-1px; background-color:#c9e1f4; }
    .cbcc_cboxB { position:absolute; display:block; width:100%; height:1px; bottom:-1px; background-color:#c9e1f4; }
    .cbcc_cboxTL, .cbcc_cboxTR, .cbcc_cboxBL, .cbcc_cboxBR {
        
         background-repeat:no-repeat;
    }
    .cbcc_cboxTL { background-position: 0px -0px; }       
    .cbcc_cboxTR { background-position: -10px -0px; }     
    .cbcc_cboxBL { background-position: 0px -10px; }      
    .cbcc_cboxBR { background-position: -10px -10px; }    

    .cbcc_box .click_region { z-index: 5; position: absolute; text-decoration: none; width: 100%; height: 100%; top: 0; left: 0; display: block; }

    .cbcc_slot_content { height:100%; position: relative; }

    .cbcc_cart_image {
        max-height: 65px;
        max-width: 130px;

        padding:0 5px;
        margin:0;
        vertical-align:middle;

        max-width: none;
    }

    }

        font-weight:bold;
        font-size:18px;
        margin:5px;
    }
    .cbcc_tagline_list {
        list-style-image: none;
        list-style-type: none;
        list-style-position: outside;
        text-align: left;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }
    .cbcc_container_right, .cbcc_container_bottom_right {
        text-align:center;
        margin: 5px;
    }
    .cbcc_container_bottom_right { float:right; }
    .cbcc_marketing_button { margin: 5px 10px; }
    .cbcc_other_cards { margin-left: 10px; }
    .cbcc_math_box {margin: 0;min-width: 200px;}
    .cbcc_math_button_row {vertical-align: top;}
    .cbcc_opt_out {font-size: 9px;padding: 5px;}
    .cbcc_margins { margin: 10px; }
    .topborder {width: 100%;height: 8px;position:relative;}
    .bottomborder {width: 100%;height: 8px;}
    .cbcc_teaser_title {
        color:#CC6600;
        font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;
        font-size:16px;
        font-weight:bold;
    }
    .cbcc_section_title {
        FONT-WEIGHT: bold;
        FONT-SIZE: 14px;
        FONT-FAMILY: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
    }
    .cbcc_bul, .cbcc_bur, .cbcc_bll, .cbcc_blr {
        
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        overflow:hidden;
        position: absolute;
        width: 8px;
        height: 8px;
    }
    .cbcc_bul {  background-position: 0px 0px; top:0; left:0; }
    .cbcc_bur {  background-position: -8px 0px;  top:0; right:0; }
    .cbcc_bll {  background-position: 0px -8px; bottom:0; left:0; }
    .cbcc_blr {  background-position: -8px -8px;  bottom:0; right:0; }

        position:relative;
        line-height: 0;
        height:8px;
        clear: both;

    .cbcc_bbottom {background-position: 0px -18px;bottom: 0;}

    .cbcc_mathright { width: 20%; }

      font-size: 9px;

    .cbcc_medium, .cbcc_medium_bold { font-size:13px; }
    .cbcc_medium_bold { font-weight: bold; }
    .cbcc_large, .cbcc_large_bold { font-size:16px;}
    .cbcc_large_bold { font-weight: bold; }
    .cbcc_extralarge, .cbcc_extralarge_bold { font-size:20px;}
    .cbcc_extralarge_bold { font-weight: bold; }
    .cbcc_header { font-size: 27px;}
    .cbcc_header_bold { font-size: 27px; font-weight:bold; }

    .cbcc_align_left {text-align:left;}
    .cbcc_align_center {text-align:center;}
    .cbcc_align_right {text-align:right;}

    
    .cbcc_mathbox { width: auto; }
    .cbcc_mathbox img { display: block; }

    
    .cbcc_inner { margin-bottom: 0; }

    
    .cbcc_float_left { float:left; }

    .cbcc_clearfloat { clear:both; }

    .toplinered{font-family:Helvetica,Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;font-weight:bold;font-size:18px;color:orange;}

<script type="text/javascript">
P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'huc-common-util','a-modal', 'ready').register('huc-v2-warranty', function(A, $, hucUtil, modal) {
    var CartPerf = window.CartPerf || {};
    var warrantyLogScopeNumber = 0;
    var isAddOrDeleteInProgress = {};

    function displayWarrantyMessageBox() {
        $('.warranty-hidden-info').each (function(i, info) {
            var data = $(info).data() || {};
            var warrantyHtml = prepareWarrantyHtml(data);
            var $warrantyDiv = $('#warranty-' + data.baseAsin);
            $warrantyDiv.html(warrantyHtml).removeClass('a-hidden');
            $warrantyDiv.closest('.huc-v2-box-warranty').removeClass('a-hidden');
            updateWarrantyActionData($warrantyDiv, true);
            logRefTag('psd_huc_i_' + data.baseAsin + '_' + data.warrantyAsin);
        });
    }

    function prepareWarrantyHtml(data) {
        var $template = $('#warrantyTemplate').clone();

        $template.find('input').attr({
            'data-warranty-asin': data.warrantyAsin,
            'data-quantity': data.quantity,
        });

        if (data.baseItemCartId) {
            $template.find('input').attr({
                'data-base-item-cart-id': data.baseItemCartId,
            });
        }

        var $warrantyTitle = $template.find('#warranty-title');
        $warrantyTitle.html(data.title);

        if (data.reviewStars) {
            $template.find('#reviewStarts').replaceWith(data.reviewStars);
        }
        if (data.reviewCount) {
            $template.find('#reviewCount').removeClass('a-hidden').text(data.reviewCount);
        }

        $template.find('.hlb-show-more-warranties').find('a').attr({
            'data-warranty-asin': data.warrantyAsin,
            'data-warranty-price': data.price,
            'data-base-asin': data.baseAsin,
            'data-quantity': data.quantity,
        });

        // Along with the CoP change, we adjusted the AUI presentation to include the .hlb-price span, rather than
        // hardcoding the span within the data attribute. Thus, we need to drill into the .hlb-price span for the place
        // to inject the price, rather than writing the span itself into .hlb-warranty-price programmatically.
        var $priceSpan = $template.find('.hlb-warranty-price').find('.hlb-price');

        $priceSpan.html(data.price);

        return $template.html();
    }

    function updateWarrantyActionData($warrantyDiv, enablePopover) {
        $warrantyDiv = $warrantyDiv || $('.hlb-warranty');
        if (!$warrantyDiv) {
            return;
        }

        var $anchor = $warrantyDiv.find('.hlb-show-more-warranties a');
        modal.remove($anchor);

        if (!enablePopover) {
            return;
        }

        var baseAsin = $anchor.attr('data-base-asin');
        var warrantyAsin = $anchor.attr('data-warranty-asin');
        var isWarrantyAdded = $warrantyDiv.find('input').prop('checked') ? 1 : 0;
        var refTag = 'psd_huc_pu_' + baseAsin + '_' + warrantyAsin;

        var header = $('#warranty-popup-title-text').html();

        var warrantyPrice = $anchor.attr('data-warranty-price');
        var url = '/gp/huc/ajax-handler/ajax-warranty-modal.html/ref=' + refTag + '?baseAsin=' + baseAsin + '&warrantyAsin=' + warrantyAsin + '&warrantyPrice=' + warrantyPrice + '&isWarrantyAdded=' + isWarrantyAdded + '&isHUCV2=1';

        modal.create($anchor, {
            "header": header,
            "url": url
        });
    }

    // This function adds,removes the warranty to cart based on the status of corresponding warranty checkbox
    function AddOrDeleteWarranty($warrantyCheckBox, fromPopup) {
        if ($warrantyCheckBox.length === 0) {
            return;
        }
        var $warrantyDiv = $warrantyCheckBox.parents('.hlb-warranty');
        var warrantyDivId = $warrantyDiv.attr('id');
        if (isAddOrDeleteInProgress[warrantyDivId])  {
            return;
        }
        isAddOrDeleteInProgress[warrantyDivId] = 1;

        var $warrantySpinner = $warrantyDiv.find('.spin-warranty-img');
        var $warrantyCheckLabel = $warrantyCheckBox.parents('.a-checkbox');
        var $warrantyErrorMsg = $warrantyDiv.find('.spin-warranty-message');
        var $learnMore = $warrantyDiv.find('.hlb-show-more-warranties a');
        var isAddingWarranty = $warrantyCheckBox.prop('checked') ? 1 : 0;
        var warrantyData = $warrantyCheckBox.data() || {};
        var quantity = warrantyData.quantity;
        var warrantyAsin = warrantyData.warrantyAsin;
        var hucArgsNewItems = $('#hucArgsNewItems').val() || '';
        var baseItemCartId = warrantyData.baseItemCartId;

        var checkboxActionRefMarker = '';
        if (!fromPopup) {
            var baseAsin = $warrantyDiv.find('.hlb-show-more-warranties a').attr('data-base-asin');
            var refTagSuffix = '_' + baseAsin + '_' + warrantyAsin;
            checkboxActionRefMarker = isAddingWarranty
                ? 'psd_huc_cy' + refTagSuffix
                : 'psd_huc_cn' + refTagSuffix;
        }
        var itemID = 0;
        $warrantyCheckBox.attr('disabled', 'disabled'); // this code can not be put in beforeHandler;
        updateWarrantyActionData($warrantyDiv, false);

        if (!isAddingWarranty) {
            itemID = warrantyData.itemid;
        }

        P.when('HUC').execute(function(HUC) {
            var data = {
                ref_: checkboxActionRefMarker,
                warrantyAsin: warrantyAsin,
                isWarranty: isAddingWarranty,
                quantity: quantity,
                itemID: itemID,
                isHUCV2: 1,
                newItemsStrIn: hucArgsNewItems
            };

            if (baseItemCartId) {
                data.baseItemCartId = baseItemCartId;
            }

            var beforeHandler = function() {
                $warrantyCheckLabel.addClass('a-hidden');
                $warrantySpinner.removeClass('a-hidden');
                //clear initiate Id before ajax-gift action
                P.when('CheckoutPrefetch').execute(function(CheckoutPrefetch) {
                    CheckoutPrefetch.clearHUCPTCInitiateId();
                });
            };
            var successHandler = function(data) {
                var requestId = data.rid;
                CartPerf.setStartTimeForAJAXRequest();
                CartPerf.setIDForAJAXRequest(requestId);

                if (data.status === 'OK') {
                    $warrantyErrorMsg.addClass('a-hidden');
                    updateDivsOnWarrantyAction(data, quantity, isAddingWarranty);
                    if (data.itemID) {
                        $warrantyCheckBox.attr('data-itemid',data.itemID);

                    }
                } else {
                    $warrantyErrorMsg.removeClass('a-hidden');
                }

                CartPerf.cfLoadedForAJAXRequest();

                //fire new prefetch
                P.when('CheckoutPrefetch').execute(function(CheckoutPrefetch) {
                    CheckoutPrefetch.initiateAndStorePurchase();
                });
            };
            var errorHandler = function(xhr, status) {
                $warrantyErrorMsg.removeClass('a-hidden');
            };
            var completeHandler = function() {
                CartPerf.pageLoadedForAJAXRequest();
                isAddOrDeleteInProgress[warrantyDivId] = 0;

                $warrantySpinner.addClass('a-hidden');
                $warrantyCheckBox.removeAttr('disabled');
                $warrantyCheckLabel.removeClass('a-hidden');
                updateWarrantyActionData($warrantyDiv, true);
            };

            CartPerf.resetUEForAJAXRequest();
            HUC.makeAjaxCall('/gp/huc/ajax-handler/warranty.html', data, successHandler, errorHandler, beforeHandler, completeHandler);
        });
    }

    function updateDivsOnWarrantyAction(data, quantity, isWarranty) {
        var $orderRowSubcart = $('#hlb-subcart');
        var $bottomOrderRowSubcart = $('#hlb-bottom-subcart');

        $orderRowSubcart.find('span.huc-subtotal').replaceWith(data.subtotal);
        $bottomOrderRowSubcart.find('span.huc-subtotal').replaceWith(data.subtotal);

        $('#hlb-ptc-btn.hlb-checkout-button.huc-button-large').find('a').text(data.pctButtonText);
        $('#hlb-ptc-btn-bottom.hlb-checkout-button.huc-button-large').find('a').text(data.pctButtonText);

        $('#hlb-ship-message').replaceWith(data.shipMessage);
        updateCountingCart(parseInt(data.totalQuantity, 10));
    }

    function updateCountingCart(cartCount) {
        P.when('nav.setCartCount').execute(function(setCartCount) {
            setCartCount(cartCount);
        });
    }

    function handleAddOrRemoveInsidePopup(action, $warrantyInfo) {
        $("#wp-cancel").find("a.a-declarative").click();
        var baseAsin = $warrantyInfo.attr('data-base-asin');
        var warrantyAsin = $warrantyInfo.attr('data-warranty-asin');
        var refTagSuffix = '_' + baseAsin + '_' + warrantyAsin;
        if (action === 'add') {
            logRefTag('psd_huc_y' + refTagSuffix);
        } else if (action == 'remove') {
            logRefTag('psd_huc_n' + refTagSuffix);
        }
        toggleCheckBox('#warranty-' + baseAsin);
    }

    function bindActions() {
        $('.hlb-warranty').find('input').bind('click', function() {
            AddOrDeleteWarranty($(this));
        });

        $(document).delegate('#wp-add span a', 'click', function(event) {
            var $warrantyInfo = $(this).parents('.wp-button-container')
                .siblings('.wp-info').find('.wp-hidden-info');
            handleAddOrRemoveInsidePopup('add', $warrantyInfo);
        });

        $(document).delegate('#wp-remove span a', 'click', function(event) {
            var $warrantyInfo = $(this).parents('.wp-button-container')
                .siblings('.wp-info').find('.wp-hidden-info');
            handleAddOrRemoveInsidePopup('remove', $warrantyInfo);
        });
    }

    function moveToTopOfMessageGroup() {
        var $warrantybox = $('.huc-v2-box-warranty');
        if ($('#huc-v2-message-group>.huc-v2-message-box').index($warrantybox) === 0) {
            return;
        } else {
            $('#huc-v2-message-group>.huc-v2-message-box').eq(0).before($warrantybox);
        }
    }

    function pageLoad() {
        hucUtil.purifyPage();
        moveToTopOfMessageGroup();
        displayWarrantyMessageBox();
        bindActions();
    }

    function getWarrantyLogScope() {
        warrantyLogScopeNumber++;
        return "ajax_warranty_log" + warrantyLogScopeNumber;
    }

    function logRefTag(refTag) {
        var component = 'huc_warranty';
        var message = 'The warranty refTag is  ' + refTag ;
        var logURL = '/gp/huc/ajax-handler/log-message.html/ref=' + refTag;
        var logScope = getWarrantyLogScope();

        var ajaxReq = $.ajax({
            type: 'GET',
            url: logURL,
            dataType: 'json',
            data: {component:component, message:message},
            success: function(data) {}
        });
    }

    function toggleCheckBox(selector) {
        var checkbox = $(selector).find('input');
        checkbox.prop('checked', !checkbox.prop('checked'));
        AddOrDeleteWarranty(checkbox, true);
    }

    pageLoad();

    //return logRefTag func which will be invoked whenever modal is rendered
    return {
        logRefTag: logRefTag
    };
});

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  window.$Nav && window.$Nav.build('PldnLocalStorage', function() {
    var PldnLocalStorage = function() {};

    PldnLocalStorage.prototype.setItem = function(key, obj) {
      if (typeof obj !== 'string') {
        obj = window.JSON && window.JSON.stringify(obj);
      }

      try {
        window.localStorage && window.localStorage.setItem(key, obj);
        return true;
      } catch (exception) {
        return false;
      };
    };

    PldnLocalStorage.prototype.getItem = function(key) {
      try {
        return window.localStorage && window.localStorage.getItem(key);
      } catch(exception) {};
    };

    return new PldnLocalStorage();
  });

  window.$Nav && window.$Nav.when('PldnLocalStorage').run('PldnUcolCheck', function(storage) {
    if (!storage.getItem('amazonSmileCampaigns')) {
      storage.setItem('amazonSmileCampaigns', {

          "optOut": false,
          "hits": [
            {
              "date": new Date(),
              "redirect": false,
              "optOut": false
            }
          ]
        }
      });
    }
  });
</script>

In0=
" />
<input id="hasworkingjs" type="hidden" name="hasWorkingJavascript" value="1" />
<script type="text/javascript">
if (window.amznJQ) {
    amznJQ.onReady('jQuery', function() {
        try {
            if (amznJQ.addPL) {
                    amznJQ.addPL("https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/41tcq0bwzlL._SS100_.jpg");
            }
        }
        catch (e) {}

        var $hasWorkingJS = jQuery('input#hasworkingjs');
        var $imgDataInput = jQuery('input#cartitemsimage');
        var $messageForm = jQuery("form#hlb-message-form");
        if ($messageForm.length > 0) {
            jQuery("form#hlb-message-form").prepend($imgDataInput);
            jQuery("form#hlb-message-form").prepend($hasWorkingJS);
        } else {
            var $imgDataForm = jQuery('<form id="hlb-message-form" action="/gp/cart/view.html/ref=lh_cart_vc_btn" method="POST"></form>');
            $imgDataForm.append($imgDataInput);
            $imgDataForm.append($hasWorkingJS);
            jQuery("body").append($imgDataForm);
            var $viewCartBtn = jQuery("div#hlb-next-steps").find("a.hlb-cart-button");
            if ($viewCartBtn && $viewCartBtn.length > 0) {
                $viewCartBtn.attr('href', 'javascript:void(0);');
                $viewCartBtn.bind('click', function() {
                    if (!jQuery(this).hasClass('locked')) {
                        jQuery("form#hlb-message-form").submit();
                    }
                    return false;
                });
            }
        }



        if (jQuery('#hlb-message-form').length > 0) {
            AmazonUIPageJS.when('nav.overrideCartButtonClick').execute(function(overrideCartButtonClick) {
                overrideCartButtonClick(
                    function() {
                        var $imbForm = jQuery('#hlb-message-form');
                        var formAction = $imbForm.attr('action');
                        // Replace ref tag as gno_cart when clicking cart icon in nav bar
                        if (!/ref=gno_cart/.test(formAction)) {
                            $imbForm.attr('action',
                                formAction.replace(/ref=.*?$/, 'ref=gno_cart')
                            );
                        }
                        $imbForm.submit();
                        return false;
                    }
                );
            });
        }
    });
}
</script>

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.msg: Page should have contained element 'ap_signin1a_pagelet_title' but did not.

test.doc: When a user adds an item to their cart and proceeds to checkout, they must log in before continuing.
test.status: Page should have contained element 'ap_signin1a_pagelet_title' but did not.

suite.doc: An improved version of the Amazon.robot test script.
